abstract: Photographer Bob Gruen, known for his candid portraits of rock music legends, has become the focus of several recent tributes. These include a retrospective art book Rock Seen, a look at his life in the Don Letts' documentary Rock N' Roll Exposed, and an elaborate installation of his photographs in the storefront of Marc Jacobs' Bleeker Street boutique.
snippet: The photographer Bob Gruen was so deeply embedded with rock bands that he was considered a virtual member.
lead_paragraph: The photographer Bob Gruen was so deeply embedded with rock bands that he was considered a virtual member.

headline.main: His Photos Are Proof: He’s With the Band
headline.print_headline: His Photos Are Proof He’s With the Band
headline.seo: Bob Gruen Captures the World of Rock in Photos
